bug.author: devlop16
bug.summary: Gaussian Hidden Units get Inconsistent results at the test stage
bug.description: the output function seams to change the seed, so for the tests to be repeatable you need to reset the seed to Nd4j.getRandom().setSeed(123); or whatever the seed is before calling the first output if you use Gaussian Hidden units.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nyghtowl>@nyghtowl</denchmark-link> this has been fixed with your PR right?
